summary: This is an email chain from June 16, 2021, between an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) from the Southern District of New York and a contractor. The AUSA requests a search for materials related to 'Bear Stearns' within the Epstein Relativity database and asks for the results to be provided to an FBI agent.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the initial request email, instructing the contractor to search the Epstein database for 'Bear Stearns' and facilitate transfer of materials to an FBI agent.

connections.description: The AUSA is giving instructions to the contractor M regarding a data search and transfer task related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Request for Bear Stearns Search in Epstein Database
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a contractor to run a search for 'Bear Stearns' within the 'FBI Files from Florida Office' folder of the Epstein Relativity database and save the results to a disk for transfer to the FBI.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: In June 2021, the SDNY was actively searching the Epstein investigation database for materials related to 'Bear Stearns'.
The search was to be conducted within a specific folder labeled 'FBI Files from Florida Office' in the Epstein Relativity database.
The results were intended to be provided to an FBI agent, indicating ongoing inter-agency cooperation in the Epstein investigation.
The correspondence confirms the existence of a centralized 'Epstein Relativity database' containing FBI files from the Florida investigation.
